author: KLOKRIECHER
title: LEGO Gear (Key Chains/Atlantis) - Shark Warrior Key Chain Review
review:
This key chain is part of the LEGO Atlantis theme and it's also the first set I got of this theme so far. It's a really cool minifig to have as a key chain but the only problems I have with those is that you're not able to take off the legs, or the head.

Pros

  • Minifig looks cool

Cons

  • Legs, head and/or headgear don't come off

Summary

All in all it's a great set to get and I would HIGHLY recommend you to get this. You can find this set on eBay, BrickLink and Amazon for sure.
